reporting.reporttable.TableQuery: Select DocumentName AS 'Name', NodeAliasPath AS 'Alias path', DocumentModifiedWhen AS 'Last modification date', FirstName + ' ' + LastName + ' (' + UserName +')' AS 'Last modified by', StepDisplayName AS 'Current workflow step' FROM View_CMS_Tree_Joined LEFT JOIN CMS_User ON View_CMS_Tree_Joined.DocumentModifiedByUserID=CMS_User.UserID LEFT JOIN CMS_WorkflowStep ON View_CMS_Tree_Joined.DocumentWorkflowStepID = CMS_WorkflowStep.StepID Where (DocumentModifiedWhen >= @ModifiedSince) AND (NodeSiteID=@CMSContextCurrentSiteID) ORDER BY DocumentModifiedWhen DESC
